posts.post_title: WTB: Hal Chase and Frank Chance offbacks
posts.post_content: Looking to add some tougher backs for any and all poses of these players. Open to buying or trading. Feel free to shoot me a PM!

Are you still looking? I have a Frank Chance SGC 3 Sov 460 back, if interested.
